table_data: Reward Points division for Panel Award

project_report.desc: Reward points should be divisible amongst the nominations
project_report.details: Award should be Pre-configured and roles must be assigned to the configured users

test_cases.desc: To verify that for single user nomination the employee must receive complete reward points.
test_cases.steps: Nominate single User in single nomination when the panel nomination starts

test_cases.desc: To verify that for multiple user nomination the reward points is divided equally as per the reward value
test_cases.steps: Nominate multiple Users in single nomination when the panel nomination starts

test_cases.desc: To verify that winner selector able to announce single user for single nomination
test_cases.steps: Winner selector announces winner when the date starts
test_cases.expected_result: Awarded successfully. Mail and Feed is generated
test_cases.actual_result: Employee receive points, mail and feed

test_cases.desc: To verify that winner selector able to announce multiple user for single nomination
test_cases.steps: Winner selector announces winner when the date starts
test_cases.expected_result: Awarded successfully. Mail and Feed is generated
test_cases.actual_result: Employees receive points, mail and feed

test_cases.desc: To verify recipient receives full reward value for single nomination
test_cases.steps: Recipient logs in to the platform and validates point statement

test_cases.desc: To verify recipient receives divided reward value for multiple nomination
test_cases.steps: Recipient logs in to the platform and validates point statement

conclusion: Conclusion of the report goes here.
